ActHazardous Products Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedule 2 to the Hazardous Products Act
PrecisOrder Amending SCHEDULE 2 TO THE HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS ACT in order to align the list of hazard classes with those in the seventh revised edition of the Harmonized System of Classification and Labelling of Chemicals.
